column9: Having had RA for 58 of my last 60 years, I have had serious progression of this problem within the last 5 years.    I just had an injection and the impact of it has been almost miraculous at this time. I, of course, have had many, many injections through the years.  Each time it has been of great benefit.  I am preparing to begin Orencia, because other than this most recent injection, nothing else has helped.
